articles.title: Top Ukrainian MP to Merkel: Enough already - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Former German chancellor’s justification of her Russia policy in a new book angers senior figures in Kyiv.
articles.content:
Merkel has also called to explore a diplomatic solution to the war at some point, though the leadership in Ukraine says that Moscow cannot be trusted to negotiate in good faith.
